abstract: The Federal Trade Commission wants to use the additional time, in part, to better understand the competitive effects of Apple’s purchase of Quattro Wireless, an AdMob rival.
snippet: The Federal Trade Commission wants to use the additional time, in part, to better understand the competitive effects of Apple’s purchase of Quattro Wireless, an AdMob rival.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Google may have gotten some help from its rival Apple in its attempt to acquire the mobile advertising start-up AdMob.

headline.main: Google-AdMob Deal Gets Extended Federal Review
headline.print_headline: Google-AdMob Deal Gets Extended Federal Review
